## SmEvent class

An event which can have a set of listeners registered against it using addListener().

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SmEvent 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addListener(callback)](./smwebsdk.smevent.addlistener.md) |  | Register a new listener for this event. |
|  [call(args)](./smwebsdk.smevent.call.md) |  | Trigger the event, calling each registered listener, and passing on any parameters. |
|  [removeListener(callback)](./smwebsdk.smevent.removelistener.md) |  | Deregister a existing listener for this event. |
